name: places/ChIJ-6Xj66pZwokRpngpCvwNr_0
formattedAddress: 137 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 137 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I visited Secret Loft for Secret Loft Comedy, a show that promised free pizza and no drink minimum, so I figured I had nothing to lose. Well I missed the early show, so I missed the pizza, but I attended the late show and was not disappointed. I entered the loft from the street, and for an unmarked loft, it was relatively easy to find. The buzzer was well labeled. Upon getting there, maybe 10 mins early, the space wasn't very crowded (though it would be packed by the time the show started). I was concerned about whether or not I'd be able to have a drink inside, but this fear was unnecessary. The staff was helpful and overall I enjoyed the venue. The venue: is one large room filled with seats with a meager stage in front. There is tech in the back. There is a small room that serves as a waiting room for the comics and a space where you can order water, etc.  A hallway and a single bathroom (which surprisingly, I never had to wait much to use). The comics: were really good. I expected people to be trying out new material and routines but it felt more like they were just polishing their routines, if that. Several of the comics had better deliver than their TV performances of the same material. When one comic was clearly trying things out, it made for funny awkwardness... The audience was never not entertained. I would definitely catch this show again. Tickets were around $10, no drink/food minimum, good audience, it's tough to beat.

originalText.text: cute secret DIY venue to dance to ur fav artists at. featuring an amazing aerialist.!!!!

originalText.text:
I attended a live comedy performance in summer 2021.  Two of the comedians had appeared on national TV.  There really is free pizza, which is quite good.  The performances were good, and COVID protocols were followed.  I have also viewed a couple of their streamed events, both were excellent.  Definitely a gem in NYC, not to be missed.

They have moved to Brooklyn and are now Silo.  Review coming there as I attended a show recently.

originalText.text: A true NYC-underground experience! Most authentic place I've been to in months, and it continues to impress-- it's still going strong during/after Covid! Great atmosphere, cheap drinks and tons of local talent-- you can't go wrong with an evening here!!!

text.text: A true NYC-underground experience! Most authentic place I've been to in months, and it continues to impress-- it's still going strong during/after Covid! Great atmosphere, cheap drinks and tons of local talent-- you can't go wrong with an evening here!!!

originalText.text: Secret Loft has amazing comedy shows and Cirque shows! It’s an incredible level of entertainment! You won’t regret going to any of their shows!

text.text: Secret Loft has amazing comedy shows and Cirque shows! It’s an incredible level of entertainment! You won’t regret going to any of their shows!
